entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 04:42 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm this morning. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
